lead_paragraph: It has been more than a year since the Start-Up Chronicle started up. It commenced with a conversation with myself, a distillation of all the questions I had heard from wary friends and skeptical planning board members about a fish restaurant I had in mind. Last week, my boss here at You're The Boss said it might be nice to revisit that format, update those original thoughts, and see what's transpired. I took his order. I aim to please. I am in the restaurant business.
snippet: On the plus side, I am becoming more human. It has forced me to be more patient, to see things from others' perspectives.

headline.main: So, Do You Like Owning a Restaurant?

abstract: On the plus side, I am becoming more human. It has forced me to be more patient, to see things from others' perspectives.
